sentences.en: an exhibition of contemporary Japanese prints
an exhibition of work by contemporary British artists
Contemporary accounts attest to his courage and determination.
sentences.cn: 当时的报道证实了他的勇气和决心。

sentences.en: Contemporary photographs are juxtaposed with a sixteenth century, copper Portuguese mirror.
sentences.cn: 几幅当代照片和一面16世纪的葡萄牙铜镜并排摆在一起。

sentences.en: He gets huge pleasure from ballet and contemporary dance.
sentences.cn: 他从芭蕾和现代舞中得到极大的快乐。

sentences.en: He is probably the most reviled man in contemporary theatre.
sentences.cn: 他可能是当代戏剧界骂声最多的人。

sentences.en: I had mentioned that I didn't really like contemporary music.
sentences.cn: 我说过，我其实并不喜欢当代音乐。

sentences.en: Like most of my contemporaries, I grew up in a vastly different world.
sentences.cn: 像我同时代的大多数人一样，我在一个非常不同的世界里长大。

sentences.en: Only the names are ancient; the characters are modern and contemporary.
sentences.cn: 只有姓名是古代的；人物都是现代的、摩登的。

sentences.en: Shakespeare was not contemporary with Dickens.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚与狄更斯不是同时代的人.

sentences.en: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.cn: 她给像惠特尼·休斯敦这样的人写了很多当代音乐作品。

sentences.en: The 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature was awarded to Mo Yan"who with hallucinatory realism merges folk tales, history and the contemporary".
sentences.cn: 2012年诺贝尔文学奖得主为莫言，他“很好地将魔幻现实与民间故事、历史与当代结合在一起”。

sentences.en: The museum contains 6,000 contemporary and modern artworks.
sentences.cn: 博物馆收藏了6,000件近现代艺术作品。

sentences.en: The telephone and the gramophone were contemporary.
sentences.cn: 电话和留声机是同一时代的产物.

sentences.en: The wall hangings are thought to be roughly contemporary with the tiled floors.
sentences.cn: 壁饰和瓷砖地面被认为差不多出现在同一时代。

sentences.en: Their marriage is a delicate balance between traditional and contemporary values.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻在传统和现代价值观之间保持着微妙平衡。

sentences.en: They still get treated differently from almost every other contemporary British band.
sentences.cn: 他们所得到的待遇仍然与当代几乎所有其他英国乐队都不同。

sentences.en: This comedy of contemporary manners is told with compassion and acid humour.
sentences.cn: 这部当代风尚喜剧杂糅了悲悯的情怀和尖酸的幽默。

words.tran_cn: 同时期的；同时代的，同时发生的
同时发生；成为同一时代
使同时发生；使成为同一时代
当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的
同时代的人；同时期的东西

trans.tran_en: someone who lived or was in a particular place at the same time as someone else
